Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://developmentor.lrlab.to/opensocial-jquery/jquery.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function($) {

  var baseUrl = 'http://developmentor.lrlab.to/opensocial-jquery';
  
  /**
   * success
   */

  var url = baseUrl + '/html.cgi';

  $.ajax({
    url: url,
    
    beforeSend: function(xhr) {
      console.log('beforeSend', xhr);
    },
    
    success: function(data, status) {
      console.log('success', data, status);
    },
    
    error: function(xhr, status, e) {
      console.log('error', xhr, status, e);
    },
    
    complete: function(xhr, status) {
        console.log('complete', xhr, status);
    }
  });

  /**
   * error
   */

  var parsererrorUrl = baseUrl + '/parsererror.json';

  $.ajax({
    url: parsererrorUrl, dataType: 'json',
    
    beforeSend: function(xhr) {
      console.log('beforeSend', xhr);
    },
    
    success: function(data, status) {
      console.log('success', data, status);
    },
    
    error: function(xhr, status, e) {
      console.log('error', xhr, status, e);
    },
    
    complete: function(xhr, status) {
        console.log('complete', xhr, status);
    }
  });

  var parsererrorUrl = baseUrl + '/parsererror.js';

  $.ajax({
    url: parsererrorUrl, dataType: 'script',
    
    beforeSend: function(xhr) {
      console.log('beforeSend', xhr);
    },
    
    success: function(data, status) {
      console.log('success', data, status);
    },
    
    error: function(xhr, status, e) {
      console.log('error', xhr, status, e);
    },
    
    complete: function(xhr, status) {
        console.log('complete', xhr, status);
    }
  });

  var parsererrorUrl = baseUrl + '/parsererror.xml';

  $.ajax({
    url: parsererrorUrl, dataType: 'xml',
    
    beforeSend: function(xhr) {
      console.log('beforeSend', xhr);
    },
    
    success: function(data, status) {
      console.log('success', data, status);
    },
    
    error: function(xhr, status, e) {
      console.log('error', xhr, status, e);
    },
    
    complete: function(xhr, status) {
        console.log('complete', xhr, status);
    }
  });

  var parsererrorUrl = baseUrl + '/parsererror.xml';

  $.ajax({
    url: parsererrorUrl, dataType: 'feed',
    
    beforeSend: function(xhr) {
      console.log('beforeSend', xhr);
    },
    
    success: function(data, status) {
      console.log('success', data, status);
    },
    
    error: function(xhr, status, e) {
      console.log('error', xhr, status, e);
    },
    
    complete: function(xhr, status) {
        console.log('complete', xhr, status);
    }
  });

  var errorUrl = baseUrl + '/404.html';

  $.ajax({
    url: errorUrl,
    
    beforeSend: function(xhr) {
      console.log('beforeSend', xhr);
    },
    
    success: function(data, status) {
      console.log('success', data, status);
    },
    
    error: function(xhr, status, e) {
      console.log('error', xhr, status, e);
    },
    
    complete: function(xhr, status) {
        console.log('complete', xhr, status);
    }
  });

});
//gadgets.ut
</script>
